==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=干}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|倝|干|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc}}.

===Etymology===
The vulgar sense entered Mandarin from {{der|cmn|nan|-}} {{zh-m|姦|kàn}}, as {{lang|zh|姦}} shares the same pronunciation with {{lang|zh|幹}} in Min Nan.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=gàn
|c=gon3
|md=gáng/guāng
|md_note=gáng - literary; guāng - colloquial
|mn=kàn
|w=2koe
|cat=n
|mc=y
|oc=y
}}

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[main]] [[part]] of something; [[body]]; [[trunk]]
#: {{zh-x|樹幹|[[trunk]] of a plant}}
#: {{zh-x|軀幹|[[body]] of animals}}
#: {{zh-x|幹道|[[main road]]; [[high street]]}}
# to [[do]]
#: {{zh-x|你 在 幹 什麼？|What are you '''doing'''?}}
# to [[work]]
#: {{zh-x|幹活|to work}}
#: {{zh-x|你 是 幹 什麼 的？|What is your '''job'''?}}
# {{lb|zh|vulgar}} to [[fuck]], to engage in [[sexual intercourse]]
#: {{zh-x|幹恁娘！|'''Fuck''' your mother! |MN}}
#: {{zh-x|幹.你.媽！|'''Fuck''' your mother! }}
# {{lb|zh|vulgar}} to [[kill]]
#: {{zh-x|幹掉 他！|'''Kill''' him!}}
# {{lb|zh|vulgar|chiefly|Taiwan}} to [[steal]]
#: {{zh-x|誰 幹 走 了 我 的 筆？！|Who '''stole''' my pen?!}}
# {{lb|zh|vulgar|chiefly|Taiwan}} to [[blame]], to [[condemn]]
#: {{zh-x|公 幹|'''criticized''' by everyone}}
